textContent:
If we don't understand each other, can't understand each other, and stay together, then we are potentially depriving ourselves of a relationship that brings out our true selves 

If we learn to understand each other, support each other's needs, and speak each other's languages and we stay together, then we are more able to bring out our true selves 

My true self 

I want to feel connected and I feel this way by being seen, understood, supported, encouraged, pushed. 

I care for -> you feel appreciative 
I cook for -> you feel satiated 
I listen with -> you feel delighted
I play with -> you feel entertained 
I help with -> you feel taken care of
I teach for -> you feel clear 
I touch -> you feel pleasure
I adventure with -> you feel surprised 
I discover with -> wowed

I get my satisfaction from the connection created through the shared experience and positive reaction. This is core to my source of joy and purpose. 

And I don't feel like this is acceptable. Like the very idea of wanting to enjoy something with you takes away your joy of doing the activity. Only when there is no expectations can you enjoy it. And this feel feels like we are constantly separated, with little intimacy or sense of connection.
title: Marriage Thoughts
textContentHtml:
If we don't understand each other, can't understand each other, and stay together, then we are potentially depriving ourselves of a relationship that brings out our true selves 


If we learn to understand each other, support each other's needs, and speak each other's languages and we stay together, then we are more able to bring out our true selves 


My true self 


I want to feel connected and I feel this way by being seen, understood, supported, encouraged, pushed. 


I care for -> you feel appreciative 

I cook for -> you feel satiated 

I listen with -> you feel delighted

I play with -> you feel entertained 

I help with -> you feel taken care of

I teach for -> you feel clear 

I touch -> you feel pleasure

I adventure with -> you feel surprised 

I discover with -> wowed


I get my satisfaction from the connection created through the shared experience and positive reaction. This is core to my source of joy and purpose. 


And I don't feel like this is acceptable. Like the very idea of wanting to enjoy something with you takes away your joy of doing the activity. Only when there is no expectations can you enjoy it. And this feel feels like we are constantly separated, with little intimacy or sense of connection.
